subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Chris Bosh became Toronto’s career leader in double-doubles last night when he had 13 points and 17 rebounds to lead the host Raptors to a 96-83 victory that moved them ahead of the Miami Heat and into third place in the Eastern Conference.
snippet: Chris Bosh became Toronto’s career leader in double-doubles last night when he had 13 points and 17 rebounds to lead the host Raptors to a 96-83 victory that moved them ahead of the Miami Heat and into third place in the Eastern Conference.
